name: funkwhale
description: Funkwhale is a self-hosted, federated audio streaming platform for sharing and listening to music. It supports playlists, user uploads, and ActivityPub federation, providing a decentralized alternative to SoundCloud.
features: Audio Streaming: Self-hosted music platform, Federated sharing, Playlists and uploads. Decentralized SoundCloud alternative.
ActivityPub: Connect with other instances. Federated network.
User Uploads: Share your music. Community-driven.
Privacy-Focused: Own your audio library. No tracking.
Playlists: Create and share collections. Organized listening.
Radio Mode: Discover new music. Automated playback.
Podcasts: Host and stream shows. Versatile platform.
Mobile Apps: Listen on the go. Full mobile support.
Import: Upload your library. Easy migration.
